item.title: Tabi add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Life seems but a quick succession of busy nothings." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "When so many hours have been spent convincing myself I am right, is there not some reason to fear I may be wrong?" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You donâ€™t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Tabi add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tabi add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Tabi add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "You need not be sorry for her. She was one of the kind that likes to grow up. In the end she grew up of her own free will a day quicker than the other girls." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Tabi add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Her own thoughts and reflections were habitually her best companions." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tabi add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description:
"If a person has ugly thoughts, it begins to show on the face. And when that person has ugly thoughts every day, every week, every year, the face gets uglier and uglier until you can hardly bear to look at it.
A person who has good thoughts cannot ever be ugly. You can have a wonky nose and a crooked mouth and a double chin and stick-out teeth, but if you have good thoughts it will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Tabi add a quote by St. Augustine.
item.description: "Trust the past to the mercy of God, the present to His Love and the future to His Providence. " -- St. Augustine.
